title: simhA calamuna
sahitya:
simhA calamuna velasina shrI narasimhA mahima teliya vasamA


anupallavi

  simhAsanamuna mA ramaNI maNi ciru navvulatO sirulu kuriyimpa


caraNam    varamulu vEDa narulu vElu vElu varadAyani piluva kalugu mElu 
karamulO abhayamiccina cAlu muraLIravamunu niratamugrOlu
